Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: This is a very good game if you take it for what it is. I enjoyed every minute and played the first time for four hours. I don`t do that if a game is boring or i get stuck. Liked most of the characters and that it was a easy game to play (i don`t like when you spend hours figuring out stuff. Hope you like it and enjoy. :-D
